title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Ramius Slasher
content:
The latest twist on this Halloween classic puts you aboard the pitch-dark confines of the Ramius submarine. You’ll need to rely on your remaining senses to navigate multiple decks, survive combat at close quarters, and evade a watery grave.

Fight it out beneath the waves in Slasher (Ramius Submarine) to earn 2X GTA$ and RP as part of the Featured Series from October 16–22.
